886280.name: Kona VR
886280.description:
Experience the eerie and chilly atmosphere of Kona, now with Oculus Rift, HTC VIVE™ and motion controller support! Step into the shoes of detective Carl Faubert to explore the mysterious surroundings of Atamipek Lake, investigate surreal events, and battle the elements to survive–all with the enhanced immersion of virtual reality!

Features

  • Experience Kona’s many mysteries from an entirely new perspective
  • Rotate and inspect objects using Oculus Touch or VIVE™ motion controllers
  • Navigate the Atamipek region in either comfort or normal mode, allowing both beginners and experimented VR players to fully enjoy Kona’s vintage look and feel
  • Get behind the wheel and drive on atmospheric wintry roads reminiscent of 1970s rural communities
  • Continue your existing non-VR playthrough in VR thanks to cross-save support between the two modes
